thread.title: India's PV Sindhu loses to Li Xuerui in Denmark Open final - newsR
thread.title_full: India's PV Sindhu loses to Li Xuerui in Denmark Open final - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: India's PV Sindhu loses to Li Xuerui in Denmark Open final - newsR
text: Odense, Oct 18: Indian woman shuttler PV Sindhu faltered against Olympic champion Li Xuerui of China in the final of the $650,000 Denmark Open Superseries Premier badminton tournament here on Sunday.Double World Championships bronze medallist Sindhu lost to Xuerui 19-21, 12-21 Â»
